priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Integumentary System Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C170444

self.title: CDISC SDTM Integumentary System Test Name Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist to describe the test names for examinations of the integumentary system.
name: Integumentary System Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Integumentary System Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of the affected body surface area to total body surface area.
terms.preferredTerm: Affected Body Surface Area to Total Body Surface Area Ratio Measurement
synonyms: Affected Body Surface Area/Total Body Surface Area
